Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    de.businesscode.bcdui.binding.BindingItem.getDisplayFormat()
    This method should no longer be used. Instead the method BindingItem.getJDBCDataType() can be called.
    de.businesscode.bcdui.binding.BindingItem.getDisplayFormatAsNode()
    Use the method BindingItem.getJDBCDataType() instead.
    de.businesscode.bcdui.binding.Bindings.get(String)
    This getter is deprecated because it prevents the BindingSetGroup feature from being totally transparent to the user.
    de.businesscode.bcdui.toolbox.ServletUtils.setExpirationHeader(HttpServletResponse, long)
    use instead public void setExpirationHeader(HttpServletResponse response, int liveTimeInMinutes)
    de.businesscode.bcdui.web.i18n.I18nDbResources.getCon()
    de.businesscode.bcdui.web.i18n.I18nDbResources.getLang()
    de.businesscode.bcdui.web.i18n.I18nDbResources.setCon(Connection)
    de.businesscode.bcdui.web.i18n.I18nDbResources.setLang(Locale)
    de.businesscode.bcdui.web.servlets.ZipLet.decodeAndDecompressToXML(String)
     
    de.businesscode.bcdui.wrs.save.ServerSideValueBean.getUserName()
    use ServerSideValueBean.getUserLogin() instead
    de.businesscode.util.JNDIProvider.getInstance()
    will be removed after BCD-UI 4.5
    de.businesscode.util.JNDIProvider.getLocalInstance(String)
    will be removed after BCD-UI 4.5
